description: This file defines the AppTheme class that provides a static method to generate a light theme for a Flutter application, including color schemes, app bar styling, navigation rail, card, input decoration, and text themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides a method to generate a customized light theme for Flutter apps utilizing Material 3 styling.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Creates and returns a ThemeData object configured for a light theme with custom colors and component styles.
